front.title: A guide for librarians and archivists

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document is a comprehensive review of procedures for the care and handling of optical disc media, providing both guidlines and introductory information for both the expert and the end user (librarians, archivists) of CDs and DVDs.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
